    • readRow

      public java.nio.ByteBuffer readRow​(long index)
      Description copied from interface: Table
      Returns a previously appended row at the given index. Indexes, unlike row numbers are 0-based. The implementation checks the argument is in the valid range.
      Specified by:
      readRow in interface Table
      Parameters:
      index - ≥ 0 and < Table.size()
      Returns:
      non-null buffer with Table.ROW_WIDTH remaining bytes
